column1: As a user, I'd like an example of creating a command line slices app using Maven
As a user, I'd like an example of creating a command line slices app using ANT
As a user, I'd like an example of creating a web based slices app using Maven
As a user, I'd like an example of creating a web based slices app using ANT
As a user, I'd like to be able to start slices from the command line
As a user, I'd like to be able to publish a service for consumption by other within a Slice application
As a user, I'd like to be able to consume a service for provided by other within a Slice application
As a user, I'd like to be able to start a slices application packaged in a single JAR at the command line.
As a user, I'd like to be able to start a slices application packaged in a single WAR in a servlet container.
As a developer, I'd like slices to find SlicePersonalities on it s classpath and instantiate them
As a user I'd like to use a slices namespace to configure my service exports and references
As a user I'd like to be able to explicitly specify the name s a service is exported at
As a user, I'd like to be able to reference a service as a property
